attribute.expr: self.isModel = false and self.expense = false and (self.endDate = null or self.endDate > :__date__) and self.sellable = true and self.dtype = 'Product'

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: "self.isModel = false and (self.endDate = null or self.endDate > :__date__) and self.dtype = 'Product' and (SELECT sellable FROM ProductCompany productCompany WHERE productCompany.product.id = self.id AND productCompany.company.id = ${__parent__ ? __parent__.company.id : saleOrder.company.id}) IS TRUE"
